Name Rascal/Libraries/LabeledGraph/successors

Function set[&T] successors(LGraph[&T] G, &T From)
Description Returns the direct successors of node From in LabeledGraph G.
Examples 
rascal>import LabeledGraph;
ok
rascal>successors({<1,"A",2>, <1,"B",3>, <2,"C",4>, <3,"D",4>}, 1);
set[int]: {3,2}
[Edit] | [New] | [Compile Course] | [Warnings]
